text: Can #cannabis help with #cancer challenges? Join our Men’s Group this Wed, Nov 28, 7pm at Carma House NW for a Q&A with Dean England, Clinical Pharmacist at Tom Baker Cancer Centre. Call 403-521-5292 to become a member (free & easy) and register online at https://t.co/OwbxFLfM2q https://t.co/NB4Rcc6582
